channel.title: dotnet on Kris - The Coding Unicorn
channel.description: Recent content in dotnet on Kris - The Coding Unicorn

item.title: [ðŸŽ„.NET Advent CalendarðŸŽ„] Strengthening security posture of containerized .NET applications with Chiseled Ubuntu Containers
item.description: This blog post explains how you can run containerized .NET applications in a more secure manner with Chiseled Ubuntu Containers

item.title: How to override ASP.NET Core application runtime version
item.description: In this post we take a look at how we can make an ASP.NET Core application use a different runtime version than the one it was compiled with.

item.title: Detect and avoid this certificate validation trap in .NET!
item.description: In this post we take a look at how to use ServerCertificateValidationCallback cautiously in .NET without creating security vulnerability in the code.

item.title: Automate .NET target framework update with PowerShell
item.description: Let's take a look at how we can automate update of .NET target framework across projects with PowerShell.

item.title: Improving .NET code quality with NDepend in Visual Studio and Azure DevOps
item.description: This blog post explains how to use NDepend to analyze and improve code quality manually and automatically as part of CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps with help of NDepend tool.

item.title: How to perform static code analysis of .NET Code with Security Code Scan
item.description: This blog post explains how to perform static code analysis of .NET code locally and as part of CI/CD with Security Code Scan tool.

item.title: Could not load file or assembly...Oh my! How I went through five stages of grief and mastered assembly version conflict debugging with .NET CLI, ILSpy and Fusion Log
item.description: This blog post explains how to debug and resolve assembly versioning conflicts with .NET CLI, ILSpy and FusionLog.

item.title: How to distribute console applications easily with .NET tools
item.description: This blog post explains how packaging console apps as .NET tools will make it possible to distribute them in a faster and easier manner.

item.title: How to create new microservices easily with dotnet custom templates
item.description: This blog post explains how dotnet custom templates can be used in order to easily start development of a new microservice
